Articles.Content: This would be a simple thing that would allow the building of rockets and planes in the VAB/SPH to be much easier. Basically you could press a button on your keyboard while you are holding something so you can edit its position in the VAB/SPH with x y and z coordinates, it would also allow you to input the exact degress its angle is at and stuff, you could also click on an option to "snap" it to the grid this would basically set it so the middle is at a direct number and decimal like 1.1,2.0,-3.5 or something like this. this would be great it would make building much easier.
